titles.title: 585 Some Time We'll Understand (easy word fit diff

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Not now
But in the coming years
It may be in the better land
We'll read
The meaning of our tears
And there - sometime
We'll understand

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Then trust in God
Through all thy days
Fear not for He
Doth hold thy hand
Though dark thy way
Still sing and praise
Sometime - Sometime
We'll understand

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We'll catch
The broken thread again
And finish
What we here began
Heav'n will the
Mysteries explain
And then - Ah then
We'll understand

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We'll know
Why clouds instead of sun
Were over
Many a cherished plan
Why song has ceased
When scarce begun
'Tis there sometime
We'll understand

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Why what
We long for most of all
Eludes so oft our eager hand
Why hopes are crushed
And castles fall
Up there - sometime
We'll understand

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
God knows the way
He hold the key
He guides us with
Unerring hand
Sometime with tearless
Eyes we'll see
Yes there - up there
We'll understand
